title: Smart Agriculture Techniques: How Farmers Achieve High-Yield Cucumber Cultivation

tasks.task: Constructing and managing a greenhouse for melon cultivation
subtasks: Determine the design and installation criteria for a durable greenhouse
Assemble a sturdy steel frame for the greenhouse
Apply UV-resistant polyethylene film to cover the greenhouse
Install ventilation and temperature control systems within the greenhouse

tasks.task: Preparing the soil and planting seeds
subtasks: Loosen and enrich the soil in the greenhouse
Plant melon seeds at appropriate spacing (30-50 centimeters apart)
Connect the drip irrigation system to provide precise water and nutrient delivery
Consider using LED lighting to supplement natural sunlight if necessary

tasks.task: Pollinating and nurturing the melon plants
subtasks: Manual pollination using brushes or by introducing honeybees
Regularly prune leaves and side branches to support fruit development
Apply organic or bio fertilizers to ensure consistent plant nutrition
Hand-pick the melons to minimize plant damage
Inspect harvested melons for quality, discarding substandard ones
Pack the cucumbers into boxes or bags with ventilation holes for freshness
Minimize pesticide use through controlled environment monitoring
